import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";// Reducers imported
import{authReducer}from"./auth/reducers";import{mediaReducer}from"./media/reducers";var rootReducer=combineReducers({auth:authReducer,media:mediaReducer});export default function configureStore(){var middlewares=[thunkMiddleware];var middleWareEnhancer=applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares);var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools(middleWareEnhancer));return store;}
